newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan to invite fresh bids for Basmati shipment.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan to invite fresh bids for Basmati shipment.

text.p: The state-run Rice Export Corp of Pakistan (RECP) plans to invite fresh bids for the sale and export of 30,000 tonnes of 1995-96 (July-June) Basmati rice, a company official said on Sunday.

He said the RECP had scrapped two earlier bids -- one at $421 per tonne FOB from Hamid al-Faris of Saudi Arabia and the other from a Pakistan-based firm -- because they were below the last auction price of $433.75 per tonne FOB for 10,000 tonnes of Basmati rice in August.
